long_description: Designed for smaller beginners but built with features you won't outgrow as your skills progress, the 10 ft. 6 in. Old Town Camden 106 Kayak is easy to paddle and outfitted for fun. Short hull is great for small paddlers who want a kayak that's easy to transport to the water and easy to control. Polyethylene offers excellent durability and easy care. Stabil-form(TM) hull design delivers outstanding stability and speed with exceptional tracking for its length. Seat features 4 separate adjustments to dial in the comfort, and channels on the seating surface enhance airflow and drainage. Padded thighbraces and adjustable footbraces personalize the boat fit to enhance stability and control while paddling. Stern hatch seals with an audible "click," and a stern bulkhead helps keep contents dry. Bungee deck rigging at bow and stern secures extra gear on board; toggle carry handles offer convenient transport to and from the water. The Old Town Camden 106 Kayak weighs approximately 42 lbs.
short_description: Designed for smaller beginners but built with features you won't outgrow as your skills progress, the 10 ft. 6 in. Old Town Camden 106 Kayak is easy to paddle and outfitted for fun.
